snippet: “Colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and His Years of Pilgrimage,” a hit in Japan, will be published in the United States in August.
abstract: “Colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and His Years of Pilgrimage,” a hit in Japan, will be published in the United States in August.

headline.main: New Murakami Novel Coming in August
headline.print_headline: New Murakami Novel Due in U.S. in August
